title: Mutable Variable Bindings in Rust
description: In this lab, you will learn about mutability in Rust and how variable bindings can be made mutable using the mut modifier. The lab includes an example of declaring immutable and mutable bindings, demonstrating how a mutable binding can be modified, and highlighting the error when trying to assign a new value to an immutable variable.

meta.title: Rust Mutability | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn about mutability in Rust and how to use the mut modifier to make variable bindings mutable. Explore immutable and mutable bindings, and understand the errors when trying to assign a new value to an immutable variable.
meta.keywords: Rust, Mutability, Programming, Tutorials, Variable Bindings
